samples.name: Overview
samples.description: This example demonstrates the overview usage of the Syncfusion Floating Action Button (FAB).

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities - icon, only label & icon with label of the Syncfusion Floating Action Button (FAB).

samples.name: Position
samples.description: This example demonstrates all the available built-in positions of the Floating Action Button (FAB).

samples.name: Styles
samples.description: This example demonstrates the available types of the Syncfusion Floating Action Button (FAB).
